posts.post_content:
1910 T206 Wee Willie Keeler.  $65 -- SOLD 

Crease in the lower right corner.  Clean Sovereign 350 back.  Card measures 2 and 9/16 inches by 1 and 3/8 inches, which is 1/16 of an inch too short and 1/16 of an inch too narrow, so I think it may have been trimmed.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
